name: "Forever Knight" Part 2 Quiz | Forever Knight | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
True.

	LaCroix brought Nick across in 1228.

questions.text: Who was the mortal that LaCroix fell in love with?
questions.explanation:
Nick's sister.

	LaCroix fell in love with Nick's sister and wanted to bring her across. Nick talked him out of it.

questions.text: Did Nick ever marry after becoming a vampire?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Nick did marry.  He tried to bring his new wife across but he took too much blood and killed her instead.  It was his first attempt to bring someone across.

a stake through the heart.

	In the last episode, Nick asked LaCroix to kill him with the stake after Nick had taken too much blood from Natalie and was forced to let her die.

questions.text: Michael Knight was a character on "Forever Knight".
questions.explanation:
False.

	Michael Knight was the main character on "Knight Rider".  Nick Knight is the main character on "Forever Knight".

Myra.

	Although we heard Myra's name on several occasions we never saw her.

questions.text: How long were Nick and Janette a couple?
questions.explanation:
97 years.

	You had to be paying close attention to catch that one.  It was revealed when Nick was having one of his flashbacks.

questions.text: What was Nick's job with Metro Police?
questions.explanation:
detective.

	To be more specific, he was a homicide detective.

questions.text: What did Nick tell his captain so he would be placed on the night shift?
questions.explanation:
he was allergic to sunlight.

	Since he could not admit to being a vampire, Nick told his captain he was allergic to sunlight.
